meanings.sent1: The toy car was cheaper than the real one.
meanings.sent2: I bought the cheaper shirt because it was on sale.
meanings.sent3: It was funny to see the cheaper version of the famous painting.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a cheaper version of sunshine on a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The cheaper option stood out like a bright light in the darkness.

meanings.sent1: The hotel room was cheaper during the off-season.
meanings.sent2: I chose the cheaper phone model to save money.
meanings.sent3: The magician's cheaper tricks were just as entertaining.
meanings.sent4: His words were a cheaper way to express his true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The cheaper option beckoned to me like a siren's call.
